alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:29PM CST until January 03 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR CENTRAL RUSSELL COUNTY... At 429 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seale, or 9 miles east of Hurtsboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russell County Sports Complex, Seale and Hatchechubbe. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
